DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : group ( glaucoma study group control group ) : men woman least 50 year age glaucoma study group : diagnosis primary open angle glaucoma ( POAG ) Exclusion criterion : group ( glaucoma study group control group ) : le 18 year age pathology central retina optic nerve disorder glaucoma retinal vascular disorder glaucoma study group : glaucoma diagnosis primary open angle glaucoma control group : diagnosis glaucoma
